Text.Page:
It's time to hurt the Dagonites.

Engage the elite guardians in the Depths of Corruption, including {@LinkCreature:42#1100#nickar enchantresses} and {@LinkCreature:42#1200#naga masakaris}, and collect their satchels.

Report to Glasrinne in Frontera when you're finished.
The nagas are weaker, thanks to you. But there's still a lot to do, and I hope you'll stick around to help out.
I never said it'd be easy, but what you're doing is helping us stay alive and do what we came here to do. Don't stop now.
